Amanda Kim is currently in her doctoral training program at Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, under the NIH T32 Psychiatric Epidemiology training grant. Her research interests is focused on understanding the co-occurrence of autism spectrum disorder and eating disorders/disordered eating from the life course perspective.
